subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The Giants’ secondary has been banged up all season, but on Thursday, two of the N.F.L.’s better, and bigger, wide receivers will be going against an inexperienced and small cornerback.
snippet: The Giants’ secondary has been banged up all season, but on Thursday, two of the N.F.L.’s better, and bigger, wide receivers will be going against an inexperienced and small cornerback.
